Featured-image: PC907-mint-mock-two-piece-prom-dress-with-full-skirt_p.jpg

Description: A mock two piece with a satin bust covered with a sheer overlay and dripping beadwork. A circular cutout in the back accents the silhouette. The floor length skirt is a pleated chiffon.
